DOC.detailed_description: The purpose trial evaluate efficacy single dose amphotericin B treatment VL India . Primary objective : Comparison efficacy single dose 10 mg/kg liposomal amphotericin B amphotericin B deoxycholate regard final cure rate Secondary objective : . Comparison safety single dose 10 mg/kg liposomal amphotericin B amphotericin B deoxycholate administer propose dosage regimens .
DOC.criteria: Children adults 265 year age ( inclusive ) either gender . Diagnosis VL confirm spleen bone marrow aspirate . Clinical sign symptom compatible VL . Biochemical haematological test value follow : Haemoglobin > 3.5g/100mL White blood cell count > 0.75 x109/L Platelet count > 40 x 109/L AST , ALT alkaline phosphatase < 5 time upper normal limit Prothrombin time < 4 second control Serum creatinine level 1.5 time upper normal limit Serum potassium level within normal limit HIV negative . A history intercurrent concurrent disease ( e.g . chronic alcohol consumption drug addiction ; renal , hepatic , cardiovascular CNS disease ; diabetes ; tuberculosis ; infectious major psychiatric disease ) may introduce variable affect outcome study . Any condition investigator think may prevent patient complete study therapy subsequent followup . Proteinuria ( > 2+ ) . A history allergy hypersensitivity amphotericin B Previous treatment VL within two week enrollment study . Prior treatment failure amphotericin B .
